Package dontlookback

Class CollisionDetector

java.lang.Object
dontlookback.CollisionDetector
public class CollisionDetector extends Object
Collision Detection System Provides collision detection functionality for the Don't Look Back game. Uses Axis-Aligned Bounding Box (AABB) collision detection for efficient and reliable collision checking between game entities.
Version:
1.0
Author:
DLB Team

  • Method Details

    • checkPlayerMonsterCollision

      public static boolean checkPlayerMonsterCollision(Player player, BasicMonster monster)
      Check collision between player and monster using AABB collision detection
      Parameters:
      player - The player to check
      monster - The monster to check against
      Returns:
      true if collision detected, false otherwise

    • checkPlayerWallCollision

      public static boolean checkPlayerWallCollision(Player player, float[] wallBox)
      Check collision between player and a wall/solid object
      Parameters:
      player - The player to check
      wallBox - Bounding box of the wall {minX, minY, minZ, maxX, maxY, maxZ}
      Returns:
      true if collision detected, false otherwise

    • checkPlayerItemInteraction

      public static boolean checkPlayerItemInteraction(Player player, float itemX, float itemY, float itemZ, float itemSize)
      Check collision between player and an item for pickup/interaction
      Parameters:
      player - The player to check
      itemX - Item X position
      itemY - Item Y position
      itemZ - Item Z position
      itemSize - Size of the item for collision detection
      Returns:
      true if within interaction range, false otherwise

    • getSafeMovementPosition

      public static float[] getSafeMovementPosition(Player player, float newX, float newY, float newZ, float[][] obstacles)
      Check if a movement would cause a collision and return safe position
      Parameters:
      player - The player attempting to move
      newX - Proposed new X position
      newY - Proposed new Y position
      newZ - Proposed new Z position
      obstacles - Array of obstacle bounding boxes to check against
      Returns:
      Array with safe position {x, y, z} or null if movement is safe

    • getPlayerBoundingBox

      public static float[] getPlayerBoundingBox(Player player)
      Get player's bounding box for collision detection
      Parameters:
      player - The player
      Returns:
      Bounding box {minX, minY, minZ, maxX, maxY, maxZ}

    • createWallBoundingBox

      public static float[] createWallBoundingBox(float centerX, float centerY, float centerZ, float width, float height, float depth)
      Create a wall bounding box for collision detection
      Parameters:
      centerX - Wall center X position
      centerY - Wall center Y position
      centerZ - Wall center Z position
      width - Wall width
      height - Wall height
      depth - Wall depth
      Returns:
      Wall bounding box {minX, minY, minZ, maxX, maxY, maxZ}

Don't Look Back - Horror Survival Game Engine

Built with Java 17, LWJGL 3.3.4, JBox2D | GitHub Repository | Report Issues
